name: The Knight's Journey
description:
This is a game in active development. I am a solo developer, so expect slow upgrades. Not all browsers support wasm (e.g. safari). The final product would be an android game.

Current State (April 2022) :

  • Proof of concept mini deck with tutorial and a minor sub-plot ;)
  • Four Assets: Gold, Armor, Health, Karma
  • If a player cannot play a card, the game is over
  • Single thumb operation: Play or Select

Future plans:

  • Multiple decks to choose from
  • Each deck has a story to tell
  • During a single game session, a deck will be played multiple times, so the story would change accordingly.
  • Better UI and 3 state buttons
